column2: Elliott Associates says mulls lawsuit against AbbVie - letterUPDATE 1-Elliott Associates may sue AbbVie over scuttled deal BOSTON
column3: Nov 5 Hedge fund Elliott Associates may take legal action against pharmaceuticals company AbbVie Inc  for scuttling a merger deal with Shire Plc.  UPDATE 1-Elliott Associates may sue AbbVie over scuttled deal BOSTON
column4: Nov 5 Hedge fund Elliott Associates may take legal action against pharmaceuticals company AbbVie Inc  for scuttling a merger deal with Shire Plc. BOSTON
column5: Nov 5 Elliott Associates
column6: which suffered losses when a planned deal between pharmaceutical companies Shire PLC and AbbVie was scuttled last month
column7: may take legal action against AbbVie Inc.
column8: the hedge fund told investors in its quarterly letter.UPDATE 1-Elliott Associates may sue AbbVie over scuttled deal BOSTON

column2: Eletropaulo profit jumps nearly five-fold on excess power sales RIO DE JANEIRO
column3: Nov 5 Eletropaulo Metropolitana SA
column4: the Brazilian utility controlled by U.S. power company AES Corp
column5: said on Wednesday that third-quarter profit rose nearly five-fold as the company sold excess energy on the spot market at prices driven higher by drought.

column2: UPDATE 1-Actavis CEO makes case for the right deal amid Allergan talk Nov 5 The top executive of Actavis Inc
column3: which sources say is pursuing a "white knight" acquisition of Allergan Inc
column4: made a case Wednesday for doing a deal
column5: saying the drug company could continue to grow earnings and manage its debt load.

column2: Ex-UPS exec's son pleads guilty to fraud scheme over Maxim magazine NEW YORK
column3: Nov 5 The son of a former United Parcel Service Inc vice president pleaded guilty to a scheme in which he impersonated his father to fraudulently obtain millions of dollars intended to finance the purchase of Maxim magazine.

column2: Exclusive:Citgo auction proceeds even after Venezuelan minister says canceled - sources NEW YORK At least three oil companies are still actively bidding for Citgo Petroleum Corp
column3: the U.S. refining arm of Venezuela's PDVSA
column4: even after the country's finance minister said that the auction was no longer going ahead
column5: according to three people familiar with the situation.

column2: Market share gains drive Whole Foods profitUPDATE 1-Whole Foods profit beats on market share gains Nov 5 Upscale grocer Whole Foods Market Inc  reported a better-than-expected quarterly profit as the company increased its market share and launched new products.  UPDATE 1-Whole Foods profit beats on market share gains Nov 5 Upscale grocer Whole Foods Market Inc  reported a better-than-expected quarterly profit as the company increased its market share and launched new products. Nov 5 Upscale grocer Whole Foods Market Inc
column3: which specializes in organic and natural food products
column4: reported a 5.7 percent rise in quarterly profit as the company gained market share and launched new products.UPDATE 1-Whole Foods profit beats on market share gains Nov 5 Upscale grocer Whole Foods Market Inc  reported a better-than-expected quarterly profit as the company increased its market share and launched new products.
